statements: SELECT * FROM ProjectIntegration;
SELECT project_name, synchronization_status FROM ProjectIntegration;
SELECT project_name, integration_platform FROM ProjectIntegration WHERE synchronization_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ProjectIntegration WHERE data_connector_id = 100;
SELECT project_name, data_connector_type FROM ProjectIntegration WHERE integration_platform = 'API';
SELECT project_name, synchronization_status FROM ProjectIntegration WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ProjectIntegration WHERE project_name LIKE '%ABC%' AND synchronization_status = true ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, integration_platform FROM ProjectIntegration WHERE synchronization_status = false AND data_connector_type = 'API';
SELECT project_name, data_connector_id FROM ProjectIntegration WHERE synchronization_status = true AND data_connector_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, integration_platform, data_connector_id FROM ProjectIntegration WHERE synchronization_status = true AND data_connector_type = 'Database' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM ProjectManagementTool;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date FROM ProjectManagementTool;
SELECT project_id, project_end_date FROM ProjectManagementTool WHERE project_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ProjectManagementTool ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SyncDatabaseConnector WHERE connector_type = 'SQL';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM ProjectManagementTool WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date FROM ProjectManagementTool ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SyncDatabaseConnector WHERE connector_type = 'SQL';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM ProjectManagementTool WHERE project_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ProjectManagementTool WHERE project_name LIKE '%project%';
SELECT * FROM project_managers;
SELECT name, email FROM project_managers WHERE company = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT id, name FROM system_connectors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, type FROM system_connectors WHERE owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM data_synchronization WHERE sync_type = 'Automatic';
SELECT * FROM project_managers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT name, email FROM project_managers WHERE company = 'Tech Corp';
SELECT * FROM system_connectors WHERE type = 'API' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT owner, type FROM system_connectors WHERE id IN (3, 6, 9) AND owner IS NOT NULL;
SELECT source_system FROM data_synchronization WHERE sync_type = 'Incremental' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE priority > 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE project_id = '1234' ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE role='admin' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, priority FROM tasks WHERE priority > 3 ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE status='active';
SELECT u.user_name, t.task_name, ta.assign_date FROM users u INNER JOIN task_assignments ta ON u.user_id = ta.user_id INNER JOIN tasks t ON t.task_id = ta.task_id ORDER BY ta.assign_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks ORDER BY task_due_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT integration_name, integration_type FROM system_integration WHERE integration_type = 'API';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'To Do';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT integration_name, integration_type FROM system_integration WHERE integration_type = 'API';
SELECT project_name, project_description, task_name, task_description FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id;
